---
category: news
title: "Say his name: how horror movie Candyman is using voice-activated AR to engage audiences"
excerpt: "In the world of the horror franchise Candyman, the titular character can be summoned by saying his name in front of a mirror five times. Ahead of the release of the latest movie in the franchise, Monkeypaw Productions and MGM have partnered with augmented reality (AR) company 8th Wall to produce an AR teaser that invites audiences to call on the killer themselves."
